text: François Deguelt (born Louis Deghelt, 4 December 1932 – 22 January 2014) was a French singer. He was best known for his performance on behalf of Monaco in the Eurovision Song Contests of 1960 and 1962. Deguelt died on 22 January 2014 in Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, France from heart failure, age 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Discography and cover art at encyclopédisque.fr Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:French singers Category:People from Var
title: François Deguelt
